2560.description: Find Bozu Roku, who is hiding in the first cave below the Monastery.

2563.description: Smash 7 piles of debris in the Ninjago Caves and rebuild each one into an Altar of Imagination.

2566.description: Smash 10 Skeleton Coffins on the Ninjago Battlefield before the Skeletons can pop out!

2567.description: Destroy 2 of the Skeletons' Siege Towers on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2570.description: Show the Maelstrom Dagger to Vanda Darkflame in Nexus Tower.

2574.description: Smash Skeleton Marksmen on the Ninjago Battlefield until you find 1 Shoulder Socket Wrench.

2575.description: Smash Skeleton Marksmen on the Ninjago Battlefield until you find 3 Hammer Toes.

2576.description: Smash Skeleton Commandos on the Ninjago Battlefield until you find 5 Finger Nails.

2577.description: Smash rocks in the Ninjago Caves until you find a Diamond Gem.

2578.description: Tell Nya that Jay is almost done with the Portable Chaos Cleaner.

2579.description: Find the Dragon Mask in a chest hidden in the Cave of Black Echoes below the Monastery.

2580.description: Equip the Dragon Mask for Zane in the Monastery Ice Dojo.

2581.description: Equip the Dragon Mask and use Speedchat to perform the Dragon Roar for Cole in the Dojo of Earth.

2582.description: Find Cringe Lo, who is hiding somewhere in the Ninjago Monastery.

2583.description: Find 10 pieces of Flame Fruit and take them to Cringe Lo in the Dojo of Lightning.

2584.description: Take Cringe Lo's Love Note to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.

2585.description: Go back to the Dojo of Lightning and tell Cringe Lo that Nya isn't interested in him.

2586.description: Go to Bubu Mumu in the Ninjago Monastery and tell him that Cringe Lo has decided to quit his job.

2587.description: Find Cringe Lo in the Ninjago Caves below the Monastery.

2588.description: Take the Lucky Wolf's Paw back to Cringe Lo in the Ninjago Caves.

2589.description: Talk to Cringe Lo when he gets back to his hiding spot in the Dojo of Lightning.

2590.description: Smash Earth Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 5 Rock Fruit.

2591.description: Buy a Hardtack Biscuit from Burky Urchin in the Gnarled Forest Ravine.

2592.description: Find 20 Onyx Gems by smashing rocks in the caves below the Monastery.

2594.description: Smash Skeleton Troopers on the Ninjago Battlefield until you collect 10 Rib Bones.

2595.description: Smash Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves until you find 15 Tail Bones.

2596.description: Smash Bonezai in the Ice Shrine below the Monastery and get his Eye Bone.

2597.description: Smash Krazi in the Lightning Shrine below the Monastery and get his Funny Bone.

2598.description: Smash Frakjaw in the Fire Shrine below the Monastery and get his Jaw Bone.

2601.description: Get 10 Rockolate Bars from Johnny Umami. You'll need to help him make them first.

2602.description: Interact with one of the Dragon statues in the Dojo of Earth. Then tame the pet that appears.

2604.description: Find the 5 floating Treasure Chests that Johnny Thunder hid around the Ninjago Monastery.

2617.description: Report back to Epsilon Starcracker on the battlefield.

2618.description: Talk to Wisp Lee at the destroyed Paradox Lab in Avant Gardens.

2619.description: Use the Maelstrom Vacuum to collect 8 Maelstrom Samples from the Spider Queen's trail.

2620.description: Interact with the bricks in the Paradox Lab cage to apply the Maelstrom Cube to them.

2622.description: Report to Melodie Foxtrot by the caves behind the Paradox Lab in Avant Gardens.

2623.description: Inform Beck Strongheart about the Spider Queen.

2624.description: Collect 4 Hamster Wheels by smashing fans on the Monument.

2625.description: Collect 3 Flashlights by smashing lasers on the Monument.

2626.description: Quick Build 1 button on the Monument.

2627.description: Quick Build 1 bouncer on the Monument.

2628.description: Quick Build 1 moving platform on the Monument.

2629.description: Scare 5 birds off of the  Avant Gardens Monument.

2632.description: Smash 20 Stromlings on the Avant Gardens battlefield.

2633.description: Smash 10 Stromling Mechs on the Avant Gardens battlefield.

2634.description: Smash 15 Stromlings on the Avant Gardens battlefield.

2635.description: Smash 5 Stromling Mechs on the Avant Gardens battlefield.

2637.description: Smash 10 Dark Spiderlings in the Avant Gardens caves.

2638.description: Smash 10 Dark Spiderlings in the Avant Gardens caves.

2639.description: Quick Build the Satellite Beacon in the Sentinel Base Camp.

2640.description: Quick Build the Satellite Beacon near the entrance to the Paradox caves.

2641.description: Quick Build the Satellite Beacon under the damaged road.

2642.description: Quick Build the Satellite Beacon near the Paradox Lab ruins.

2643.description: Survive for 3 minutes in Avant Gardens Survival.

2644.description: Smash Lightning Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 5 Shock Fruit.

2645.description: Buy 1 Buttery Croissant from Farnham Spoon at the Nimbus Station Race Place.

2646.description: Buy 1 Healing Drumstick from Farnham Spoon at the Nimbus Station Race Place.

2647.description: Find 3 Stinky Fish in Gnarled Forest, or buy them from Farnham Spoon in Nimbus Station or Olivia Nightshade in Nexus Tower.

2648.description: Buy a Hiccup Tablet from Farnham Spoon at the Nimbus Station Race Place.

2649.description: Buy a Cup of Yo from Fermie LaBoosh at the Pirates' Camp in Gnarled Forest.

2650.description: Smash Ice Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 6 Frost Fruit.

2651.description: Find a bottle of Tough Buff Sauce by searching around Forbidden Valley.

2652.description: Buy a BBQ Blast Hot Dog from Farnham Spoon at the Nimbus Station Race Place.

2653.description: Gather more bricks for the wall at the Sentinel Base Camp.

2654.description: Quick Build the wall at the Sentinel Base Camp.

2655.description: Smash Bamboo in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 10 Bamboo Bites.

2656.description: Buy 3 Sushi from Kammy Kazei at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.

2657.description: Buy 2 Tasty Fish from Fermie LaBoosh at the Pirates' Camp in Gnarled Forest.

2658.description: Smash Fire Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 8 Flame Fruit.

2659.description: Smash Ice Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 8 Frost Fruit.

2660.description: Buy 2 Cherry Blasts from Heimlich Stewblaster on Crux Prime.

2661.description: Smash fans on the Avant Gardens Monument and collect 3 Hamster Wheels.

2662.description: Smash lasers on the Avant Gardens Monument and collect 4 Flashlights.

2663.description: Quick Build 1 button on the Avant Gardens Monument.

2664.description: Quick Build 1 Bouncer on the Avant Gardens Monument.

2665.description: Quick Build 1 moving platform on the Avant Gardens Monument.

2666.description: Shoo 10 birds off of the Avant Gardens Monument.

2667.description: Smash Earth Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 10 Rock Fruit.

2668.description: Buy 5 Hot Chocolate from Fermie LaBoosh at the Pirates' Camp in Gnarled Forest.

2669.description: Smash rocks in the Ninjago Caves to find 5 Onyx Gems.

2670.description: Smash Bamboo Stalks in the Ninjago Monastery to collect 5 Bamboo Bites.

2671.description: Interact with the Binoculars at the end of the broken road to see a view of the Monument.

2674.description: Smash and Quick Build the destroyed robot by the Paradox Lab in Avant Gardens.

2675.description: Use Dusty Holster's Plunger Gun to shoot 6 targets around Avant Gardens.

2676.description: Go to 5 player Properties and use Swabby's Shovel to dig up 5 treasures.

2677.description: Talk to Wisp Lee in Avant Gardens about a Maelstrom Cube for Hu Where.

2678.description: Use the Maelstrom Vacuum to collect 10 Maelstrom Samples in Avant Gardens.

2679.description: Complete the Monument Race in Avant Gardens.

2680.description: As a solo player, defeat Murgle Blotch in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

2681.description: As a solo player, defeat Kinga Hurl in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

2682.description: As a solo player, defeat Whack Bliddo in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

2683.description: As a solo player, defeat the 4 Riders in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

2684.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

2685.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

2686.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

2687.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

2689.description: Quick Build 25 Bouncers, buttons or moving platforms on the Avant Gardens Monument.

2690.description: Quick Build 100 more Bouncers, buttons or moving platforms on the Avant Gardens Monument.

2691.description: Click on the orange circle at the top of the screen.

2692.description: Use Stinky Fish to feed 5 sharks in the water around Nimbus Station.

2711.description: Search the Monastery Storeroom behind Sensei Wu to find a way into the Ninjago Caves.

2712.description: Look for the orange banners in the Ninjago Caves and find the Earth Shrine.

2713.description: Rescue all 6 trapped villagers in the Ninjago Caves.

2720.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig by the Ninjago rocket launchpad to find a treasure.

2721.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig under the Ninjago Battlefield bridge to find a treasure.

2722.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig beneath the Rock Face in the Earth Garden to find a treasure.

2723.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig by the entrance to the Ninjago Caves to find a treasure.

2724.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig by the Black Banner in the Ninjago Caves to find a treasure.

2726.description: Find all 10 of Cole's Climbing Flags around the Ninjago Monastery.

2727.description: Show the Maelstrom Dagger to Echs Ray at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.

2728.description: Smash the Refinery pipes and Quick Build the Chaos Cleaner machine. Then interact with it to purify the Maelstrom Dagger.

2729.description: Give the Portable Chaos Cleaner Instructions to Jay in the Dojo of Lightning.

2730.description: Buy 3 Bancha Tea from Johnny Umami and take them back to Kai in the Dojo of Fire.

2735.description: Look for the white Ice banners in the Ninjago Caves and find the Ice Shrine.

2742.description: Equip the Trial Faction Gear you borrowed from Melodie Foxtrot.

2743.description: Talk to Theo Balfour in the tunnel behind the Sentinel Base Camp.

2748.description: Return to the Spider Queen's lair and smash her a second time.

2749.description: Smash Frakjaw in the Fire Shrine in the caves below the Monastery.

2750.description: Smash Chopov in the Earth Shrine in the caves below the Monastery.

2751.description: Smash Bonezai in the Ice Shrine in the caves below the Monastery.

2752.description: Smash Krazi in the Lightning Shrine in the caves below the Monastery.

2753.description: Get the Earth Key from the attic above the Dojo of Earth.

2754.description: Get the Ice Key from the attic above the Dojo of Ice.

2755.description: Get the Lightning Key from the attic above the Dojo of Lightning.

2756.description: Get the Fire Key from the attic above the Dojo of Fire.

2757.description: Vance Bulwark wants you to equip the Trial Faction Gear.

2758.description: Find Skeleton Camp Cruelskull on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2759.description: Find Skeleton Camp Ribspreader on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2760.description: Find Skeleton Camp Knucklemuck on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2761.description: Find Skeleton Camp Marshmallow on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2762.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Lightning Ninja kit and show Jay.

2763.description: Return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

2764.description: Look for the blue banners in the Ninjago Caves and find the Lightning Shrine.

2765.description: Smash Skeleton Mad Scientists in the Ninjago Caves until you retrieve the 3 pages of the Skull-a-Ton Building Instructions.

2766.description: Speak to Zane in the Monastery Dojo of Ice. Follow the light blue banners to find him.

2768.description: Return to Zane in the Monastery Dojo of Ice.

2769.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Ice Ninja kit and show Zane.

2770.description: Return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

2771.description: Speak to Kai in the Monastery Dojo of Fire. Follow the red banners to find him.

2772.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Fire Ninja kit and show Kai.

2773.description: Return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

2774.description: Look for the red Dragon Statue in the Ninjago Caves to find the Fire Shrine.

2777.description: Use all 9 of the binoculars around Ninjago.

2778.description: Read all 7 of the Story Plaques around Ninjago.

2779.description: Quick Build 5 Dragon-in-a-Boxes on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2780.description: Quick Build 25 more Dragon-in-a-Boxes on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2781.description: Quick Build 75 more Dragon-in-a-Boxes on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2782.description: Quick Build 5 Skeleton Bouncers on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2783.description: Quick Build 25 more Skeleton Bouncers on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2784.description: Quick Build 75 more Skeleton Bouncers on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2785.description: Quick Build 75 more Archery Targets on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2786.description: Quick Build 75 more Catapults on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2787.description: Smash 5 Skeleton Coffins on the Ninjago Battlefield or in the Ninjago Caves.

2788.description: Smash 25 more Skeleton Coffins on the Ninjago Battlefield or in the Ninjago Caves.

2789.description: Smash 75 more Skeleton Coffins on the Ninjago Battlefield or in the Ninjago Caves.

2790.description: Smash 10 Skeletons of any type in Ninjago.

2791.description: Smash 50 more Skeletons of any type  in Ninjago.

2792.description: Smash 100 more Skeletons of any type  in Ninjago.

2793.description: Smash 200 more Skeletons of any type  in Ninjago.

2794.description: Smash 10 Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves.

2795.description: Smash 50 more Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves.

2796.description: Smash 100 more Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves.

2815.description: Discover the Earth Shrine in the caves below the Ninjago Monastery.
